snippet: Playing in the southern Russian city of Krasnodar, the United States men’s national soccer team scored in the third minute of second-half added time on a goal by substitute Mix Diskerud.
abstract: United States men's national soccer team rallies for a 2-2 tie against Russia, closing out its 2012 campaign.
lead_paragraph: Playing in the southern Russian city of Krasnodar, the United States men’s national soccer team scored in the third minute of second-half added time on a goal by substitute Mix Diskerud.

headline.seo: U.S. Men’s Soccer Team Ties Russia With Late Rally
headline.main: U.S. Manages Tie in Russia as Substitute Scores in Game’s Final Moments
headline.print_headline: U.S. Manages Tie in Russia as Substitute Scores in Game’s Final Moments
